author: bingomanatee
content:
Resources in Nuby Express are a flexible way to add modularity and extensibility to a Nuby Express application. They come in a variety of types, each of which "kicks in" at different phases of the framework's [[framework_launch_sequence:Framework load and request/response cycle]].
